content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the šiauliai district court the defendant has been ordered to pay various fees and compensation to the applicant the court has resolved the division of movable and immovable property with the applicant receiving a ford car and the defendant receiving an opel car the defendant has been awarded a dwelling house barn wood shed kitchen garage cellar yard structures and a plot of land the defendant has also been ordered to pay the applicant a compensation of €8400 the text discusses the different aspects of the matrimonial property regime and the obligations between the parties the applicant has filed for the dissolution of the marriage establishment of residence for their children and child support the defendant has filed a defense and counterclaim the court will determine the division of property and child support based on the financial circumstances and best interests of the children the court has approved the amended application and counterclaim and the marriage is being dissolved the parties have been assigned specific properties and financial obligations interim measures of protection have been annulled the court has ordered the payment of various fees and costs by each party
